Text: FWD Homecoming ParadeIf youre interested in participating in the Homecoming festivities in Tallahasseesee the following If enough club members will want to participate in the parade we do have a banner for you to bring Let me know Maureen Garrett Attorney at Law Allen Parkway Suite Houston Texas Date Thu Oct From To Subject FWD Homecoming Parade MimeVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundaryEBC Original Message From Terry A Johnson Heres a neat opportunity to share some of your clubs great Seminole spirit Mike Palios is in charge of the parade this year and together Mike and I are jointly extending this special invitation to ALL clubs to please join us for the Sesquicentennial parade of Nov th Please let me know if you are coming for I might be able to help with decorating your cars and will ALSO want to hook up with each during Saturdays pregame reception behind Garnet and Gold on Pensacola Street AFTER THE HOMECOMING breakfast Saturday AM We are strongly suggesting that if you ARE coming bring your club banner and we can use bungee cords to attach it to the front of your cars If you or ANY of your club membership is coming in for Homecoming sincerely hope that your arrival will be in time to join the parade Thanks Best Terry Terry A Johnson Seminole Club Coordinator FSU Alumni Association Webmaster W F R C Celebrating our Sesquicentennial in Original Message From Mike Palios mailto Sent Thursday October AM Subject Homecoming Parade Club Presidents Here is your chance to get the entire FSU and Tallahassee Community to know who you and your Club is This yesar on Friday November at PM the Sesquicentennial Homecoming Parade will start heading east on Call Street turning right south at Monroe Street heading south to College Avenue and making the final turn right heading west and ending at Westcott Fountain Line Up for the Parade begins at Noon at the Fine Arts building parking lot I have attached the Parade Confirmation form if you are interested You will be responsible to get your own car I suggest getting a convertable if possible and bring your Club banners so everyone knows who you are If you dont have a Club banner let me know immediately and we can make a sign to put on the side of the cars Please contact me if you have any questions at all and I hope to see many of you that day Go Noles Michael Palios Seminole Club Coordinator FSU Alumni Association C University Center Tallahassee FL PH FX Celebrating Florida States Sesquicentennial Parade Confirmation Sheetdoc ENVELOPETXT

FSU game postponedIf you havent already hearddue to our nations current situation THE FSU GAME VS GT HAS BEEN POSTPONED UNTIL DEC ST See you next week at SRO for the NC game Maureen Garrett Attorney at Law Allen Parkway Suite Houston Texas
